name: Interstellar Transplant
description:
CONTROLS:

-AD/arrow keys to walk left and right

-Space to jump/wall kick

-Shift to switch between characters

-Click, drag, and release to throw the ball

This is my first game jam entry ever! It was a lot of work but I have a thing for making all my own assets from scratch.

Play as a tiny round anteater-like alien duo transporting their captain's precious plant across the space station! Hardly see why it's worth the trouble...

WARNING: LINUX AND MAC BUILDS NOT TESTED
